sense.name: learn, receive information, take heed of
sense.examples: I hear she just got married. We heard rumors to that effect. She's heard nothing about or from him in years. The committee would like to hear the opinions of the two Nobel laureates on this matter. She just doesn't want to hear her mother's advice. Hear me out!

sense.name: perceive physical sound
sense.examples: My father doesn't hear as well as he used to. The dog heard footsteps on the front porch.

sense.name: examine evidence in a legal setting
sense.examples: The jury had heard all the evidence. The judge will hear your case next week.
